short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display all bookmarks on your home page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows all your chrome bookmarks on your new tab homepage.  Shows the bookmarks toolbar at the top of the page and then has tabs for each other folder within your bookmarks.
